00011 ORMCA927TreeWriter::ORMCA927TreeWriter(string treeName) :
00012 ORVTreeWriter(new ORMCA927Decoder, treeName)
00013 {
00014         fEventDecoder   = dynamic_cast<ORMCA927Decoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00015         fDevice                 = 0;
00016         fChannel                = 0;
00017         fLiveTime               = 0;
00018         fRealTime               = 0;
00019         fWaveformLength = 0;

00028 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORMCA927TreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00029 {
00030         fTree->Branch("wfLength", &fWaveformLength, "wfLength/i");
00031         fTree->Branch("device", &fDevice,        "device/s");
00032         fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel,  "channel/s");
00033         //fTree->Branch("waveform", fWaveform, "waveform/i");
00034         fTree->Branch("waveform", fWaveform, "waveform[wfLength]/i");
00035         fTree->Branch("liveTime", &fLiveTime, "liveTime/D");
00036         fTree->Branch("realTime", &fRealTime, "realTime/D");
00037         return kSuccess;
00038 }
00039 
00040 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORMCA927TreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00041 {
00042         // the event decoder could run into a problem, but this might not
00043         // ruin the rest of the run.
00044         if(!fEventDecoder->SetDataRecord(record)) return kFailure;
00045         fDevice                 = fEventDecoder->GetDevice();
00046         fChannel                = fEventDecoder->GetChannelNum();
00047         fLiveTime               = fEventDecoder->GetLiveTime();
00048         fRealTime               = fEventDecoder->GetRealTime();
00049         fWaveformLength = fEventDecoder->GetWaveformLen();
00050         if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00051                 ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): "
00052                         << "time-device-channel-liveTime-realTime-length- = "
00053                         << fDevice << "-"
00054                         << fChannel << "-"
00055                         << fLiveTime << "-"
00056                         << fRealTime << "-"
00057                         << fWaveformLength << "-"
00058                         << endl;
00059         }
00060 
00061         if (fWaveformLength > kMaxWFLength) {
00062                 ORLog(kError) << "Waveform too long for kMaxWFLength!" << endl;
00063                 return kFailure;
00064         }
00065         fEventDecoder->CopyWaveformData(fWaveform, fWaveformLength);
00066         fTree->Fill();
00067         return kSuccess;
00068 }
